title: SKINLESS PORK LONGANISA
directions: In a bowl, combine ground pork, oregano powder, garlic, soy sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, paprika powder, annatto powder, msg, salt and pepper. Mix until well-distributed.
Take about 2 tablespoon of pork mixture and form into a log or sausage type shape. Repeat with the remaining mixture.
Fry longganisa, turning many times, until golden brown and cooked through. Serve hot with fried rice and eggs.
